name: Aries
description: No filter, gets angry- then forgets why they were angry, naturally brave, impatient, easily bored, capable of juggling tasks

name: Taurus
description: All or nothing mindset, hates big changes, homebody, dependable, determined and committed, can be overprotective

name: Gemini
description: charismatic, uses humor as a crutch, knows a little about everything, hard to focus, sees all the sides for an argument

name: Cancer
description: feels deeply, takes on other people's feelings and problems, forgives but never forgets, loyal

name: Leo
description: warm and creative, often placed in a leadership role, insecure, wants to be seen as valuable, values others opinions more than their own

name: Virgo
description: decisive, spatially aware, thoughts move faster than they do, can come up with quick fixes for anything, needs to feel useful

name: Libra
description: harmonious, conflict avoidant, sees every side, seen as indecisive, prone to fantasy, enjoys being around others

name: Scorpio
description: passionate, assertive, determined, fearless, hates dishonesty, influencers but can become manipulative

name: Sagittarius
description: always curious, travelers, always ready for change, optimistic, overly honest, strong moral compass, often misunderstood

name: Capricorn
description: traditional, bounds of self control, realistic, capable, dependable, can be seen as workaholics, can be seen as negative

name: Aquarius
description: eccentric and energetic, highly intellectual, tend to fight for idealistic causes, need mental stimulation, easily bored

name: Pisces
description: selfless helpers, empathetic, can lack personal boundaries, creative and imaginative, tend to lean toward spirtuality
